column1: Using the first three digits of the destination ZIP Code, determine the zone for the appropriate service level by referring to the zone charts below.
Zones for Service to the 48 States and Puerto Rico
A dash (-) means service is not available.
**Customers should consult the chart from the Service within Hawaii section to determine the zone for Inter-Island Air.
***Customers on Oahu should consult the chart from the Service within Hawaii section to determine the zone for UPS Ground Service on Oahu.
